# @univerjs-pro/engine-formula

## Introduction

`@univerjs-pro/engine-formula` is a performance-enhanced version of `@univerjs/engine-formula`

## Usage

### Installation

```shell
# Using npm
npm install @univerjs-pro/engine-formula

# Using pnpm
pnpm add @univerjs-pro/engine-formula
```
